      • pickRandomCards

        private void pickRandomCards(Classes className)
        Function used to determine rarity of the cards to display, and displaying said cards.
        The chances based on rarity are as follows:
        • Common: ~90%
        • Rare: 10%
        • Epic: 4%
        • Legendary: ~1%
        Parameters:
        className - The class of the class-specific cards to include in the random card selection. Takes an element of enum Classes (Example: Classes.WARRIOR)

      • getCards

        private void getCards()
